00020 class XScalarEntry;
00021 class QMainWindow;
00022 class Ui_FrmLIA;
00023 typedef QForm<QMainWindow, Ui_FrmLIA> FrmLIA;
00024 
00025 class XLIA : public XPrimaryDriver
00026 {
00027     XNODE_OBJECT
00028 protected:
00029     XLIA(const char *name, bool runtime,
00030          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00031          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00032          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00033          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00034 public:
00035     //! usually nothing to do
00036     virtual ~XLIA() {}
00037     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00038     virtual void showForms();
00039 protected:
00040     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00041     virtual void start();
00042     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00043     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00044     virtual void stop();
00045   
00046     //! this is called when raw is written 
00047     //! unless dependency is broken
00048     //! convert raw to record
00049     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00050     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00051     //! record is readLocked
00052     virtual void visualize();
00053   
00054     //! driver specific part below
00055     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &valueX() const {return m_valueX;}
00056     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &valueY() const {return m_valueY;}
00057    
00058     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> & output() const {return m_output;}
00059     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> & frequency() const {return m_frequency;}
00060     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> & sensitivity() const {return m_sensitivity;}
00061     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> & timeConst() const {return m_timeConst;}
00062     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> & autoScaleX() const {return m_autoScaleX;}
00063     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> & autoScaleY() const {return m_autoScaleY;}
00064     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> & fetchFreq() const {return m_fetchFreq;}
00065 protected:
00066     virtual void get(double *cos, double *sin) = 0;
00067     virtual void changeOutput(double volt) = 0;
00068     virtual void changeFreq(double freq) = 0;
00069     virtual void changeSensitivity(int) = 0;
00070     virtual void changeTimeConst(int) = 0;
00071 private:
00072     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> m_valueX, m_valueY;
00073  
00074     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_output;
00075     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_frequency;
00076     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_sensitivity;
00077     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_timeConst;
00078     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> m_autoScaleX;
00079     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> m_autoScaleY;
00080     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_fetchFreq; //Data Acquision Frequency to Time Constant
00081     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOutput, m_lsnSens, m_lsnTimeConst, m_lsnFreq;
00082     xqcon_ptr m_conSens, m_conTimeConst, m_conOutput, m_conFreq;
00083     xqcon_ptr m_conAutoScaleX, m_conAutoScaleY, m_conFetchFreq;
00084  
00085     shared_ptr<XThread<XLIA> > m_thread;
00086     const qshared_ptr<FrmLIA> m_form;
00087   
00088     void onOutputChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00089     void onFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00090     void onSensitivityChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00091     void onTimeConstChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00092 
00093     void *execute(const atomic<bool> &);
00094   
00095 };
